title: Keep Your Christmas Cheer (with Willie Rennie MSP)
itunes:title: Keep Your Christmas Cheer (with Willie Rennie MSP)
description:
Pressure is growing on Boris Johnson to bring in stricter lockdown measures, as daily deaths hit their highest level since May. But there are also growing calls for the prime minister to provide an exit strategy for local lockdowns.

Scottish Liberal Democrats leader Willie Rennie tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing the four nations need to come together and make a plan for Christmas.

Plus, what would a Biden White House mean for the special relationship? Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael joins to discuss.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
